snippet.title: Ace Attorney Fangames Showcase #1 Turnabout Heartache
snippet.description:
Stream starts at 5:35

Phoenix goes on a sometimes shippy sometimes strange sometimes intense journey to find out whole framed cupid for murder.

Support me and what I do at https://streamelements.com/mitsudamadoy/tip or https://ko-fi.com/mitsudamadoy

CREDITS:
Model: [Lin Rinku](https://twitter.com/Lin_Rinku) [https://linrinku.carrd.co/](https://linrinku.carrd.co/)
Laboratory Background: [Leonard Ohh](https://www.instagram.com/leonard_ohh/)
Profile Pic: [KaiV248](https://twitter.com/KaiV248)
Other Assets: [Fumiko Hoshi](https://twitter.com/fumikohoshi)
[Argama Witch](https://twitter.com/ArgamaWitch)
[ZixiaTV](https://twitter.com/zixiaTV)
[Gael LEVEL](https://twitter.com/Level_Photo)
BGM: Coastal Stride by [AmpRen](https://linktr.ee/AmpRen) from [ViSO: Virtual Sounds by UTALIVE](https://utalive.pro/#viso)

A forensic scientist from the world of mysteries, where all works of mystery fiction take place. Accordingly, he was constantly swamped with endless evidence from bizarre locked room cases, false alibis, and nonsensical dying messages, all the while being talked down to by smug Great Detectives. In his desperation to finally get some time off, Mitsuda looked through his employment contract, and eventually uncovered a loophole where he would have his vacation days increased if he got a second job. Looking up the least demanding thing he could legally pass of as work, Mitsuda discovered the world of VTubers. It was all downhill from there. -- Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/mitsudamadoy
